metadata.title: CVE-2021-47043 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  media: venus: core: Fix some resource leaks in the error path of 'venus_probe()'  If an error occurs after a successful 'of_icc_get()' call, it must be undone.  Use 'devm_of_icc_get()' instead of 'of_icc_get()' to avoid the leak. Update the remove function accordingly and axe the now unneeded 'icc_put()' calls.
